mapper.sql: sales_contract_id, propert_id, date_start, sales_no, date_end, `second`, partya_seal, partya_time, partyb_seal, partyb_time, create_time, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT bus_agent_sales_contract.sales_no FROM `bus_agent_sales_contract` ORDER BY bus_agent_sales_contract.sales_contract_id DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT br.`report_propert`,br.`data1` AS 'debtName',br.`data5` AS 'priAdd',br.`data7` AS 'corBankAdd',br.`data2` AS 'debtIdCard',br.`data3` AS 'priPhone',br.`data9` AS 'corBankPhone', pd.`amount_this`,bra.bank,bra.bank_card,pd.`create_time`,pd.debt_yaer FROM bus_relative_person brp LEFT JOIN bus_report br ON br.`report_id` = brp.`report_id` LEFT JOIN pub_debt pd ON brp.`relative_per_id` = pd.`relative_per_id` LEFT JOIN bus_real_auth bra ON br.`report_id` = bra.report_id WHERE brp.`relative_per_id` = #{relativePerId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.insert:
insert into bus_agent_sales_contract
sales_contract_id,
propert_id,
date_start,
sales_no,
date_end,
`second`,
partya_seal,
partya_time,
partyb_seal,
partyb_time,
create_time,
update_time,

mapper.update:
update bus_agent_sales_contract
propert_id = #{propertId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
date_start = #{dateStart,jdbcType=DATE},
sales_no = #{salesNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date_end = #{dateEnd,jdbcType=DATE},
`second` = #{second,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
partya_seal = #{partyaSeal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
partya_time = #{partyaTime,jdbcType=DATE},
partyb_seal = #{partybSeal,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
partyb_time = #{partybTime,jdbcType=DATE},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where sales_contract_id = #{salesContractId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update bus_agent_sales_contract set propert_id = #{propertId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, date_start = #{dateStart,jdbcType=DATE}, sales_no = #{salesNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date_end = #{dateEnd,jdbcType=DATE}, `second` = #{second,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, partya_seal = #{partyaSeal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, partya_time = #{partyaTime,jdbcType=DATE}, partyb_seal = #{partybSeal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, partyb_time = #{partybTime,jdbcType=DATE}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where sales_contract_id = #{salesContractId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
